title: gathi neevani
sahitya:
gati nIvani nE kOri vacciti talli parAkA



anupallavi



matini entO vedaki sammatini shrI pravrddha shrImati nI 

    padayugamulanE nera nammitini brOvumika nija dAsulaku



caraNam 1



paramau shrI tapatistIrtha nagaramandu nelakonna paramAnandi

pogaDa 

     taramA bramhakainanu dharalo nI sari gAna talli nIvADanugAna 

     paritApamu lella dolaga Arakapura nAthula jatagUDi abh STa 

     varamuliccu daivamu nIvanu manu sthiramatulai gAcinAru

ganuka



caraNam 2



I puramuna bAgu kapUramu sEyuvA rEpuNyamu jEsiroO shrIpura

nilayE prApu kOri 

     unnAnu ambA parula nEnu vEDuga lEnu jUpu jUpu sEyaka nIvE

daridApu gAni anyu 

     lEvaru nAyeDa rEpu mApanaka nI mahimalu balu gOpurambugAni

sujani



caraNam 3



rAkA shashivadanE sarvalOka nAyaki vinu mAya nE vElpula

kAdiyau nI kaTAksSmu cEta

     Eka citta mainanduka ambA inka nirdaya enduku nIkani dhana

dhAnyamula kOraku I 

     lOkulanE mATi mATi kaDaguTa caukagAni nI kIrtiki nendAka

vinnavintu tyAgarAjuni
